body:
Might try manually configuring your DNS servers. Free & usually better than your isp.

  1. Goto Control Panel\Network and Internet\Network and Sharing Center > Click Change Adapter setting> Right click select properties of wifi> select internet protocol version 4 > click on use the following DNS server address and type either of the 2 DNS given below.

    GooglesDNS -->Preferred DNS server as: 8.8.8.8 
              Alternate DNS server as: 8.8.4.4
OpenDNS -->Preferred DNS server as: 208.67.222.222 
           Alternate DNS server as: 208.67.220.220
title: How to solve "server DNS address could not be found" error in windows 10?
